name: Space Ball (itch) (foxthor)
description:
*Please Note* Game can take 1-2 minutes to load depending on your computer and internet speed. It will always take longer the first time you load the game. Sometimes itch.io who hosts the game can also be running slow, if this is the case try coming back after a while.

2D Block Breaker clone of the Retro Arkanoid game. Made in unity during the Complete Unity online Udemy course.

use your mouse to control the paddle, the levels get increasingly harder.

the game is still in development, Lives will be added, new levels, and possibly power ups or other items.
